title: Atrocity

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose someone to Stalk. You stand outside their window, learning of all their system messages from this night. You also scare away all visitors of your stalked target (similar to roleblock).
- At night, you may also choose someone to Distress. You give them an exact copy of any system message that you've seen while Stalking on any previous nights and scare them, preventing them from doing their night action. You can only Distress each player once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  If you scare a player twice, you instead open your head to reveal rotating interlocking spheres of teeth, eating them (unstoppable attack) and cleaning them.
- Roleblock immune. If you scare a roleblock immune role, they are still scared for the purposes of needing two scares to eat them, but they are informed they performed their action in a rush and left out of fear.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4275
*The jailor snorted. "Yeah, we kept it in a cage. I put a big tarp over the thing so it couldn't see me - freaked me out - must have at least a hundred eyeballs in that head, looking at me from all angles, like a tumbleweed made of eyes instead of brambles. Caught it after it killed ole' man Williams."*
*"The hell you mean it escaped!"*
